TITLE: Newman Crows Landing Unified School District ANNUAL CELDT NOTIFICATION LETTER
TEXT: Dear Parent(s) or Guardian(s): In accordance with state and federal law, school districts in California are required to annually assess the language proficiency of all students whose home language is not English. Your child has been given an annual California English Language Development Test (CELDT). Each year, we are required by law to notify you of your child’s proficiency level in English. Your child’s results are enclosed.
